author: Ingrid Lunden
title: Bringg nabs $30M to expand its delivery logistics platform used by Walmart and others
description: Over the last several years, delivery services have become a key component of how retailers, or anyone selling or distributing products and services, do business. Now, with a global health pandemic in full swing keeping people indoors (and away from physical …
